program: Master of Science in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (Direct to PhD path)

toefl.notes: EECS requires a minimum of 100 on the iBT. IELTS is preferred over TOEFL.

gre.notes: GRE scores are not used during the admission process for EECS.

description_for_vector_db: MIT's EECS graduate program is research-centric. There is no terminal master's degree; the MS is earned en route to the PhD. Successful applicants usually have extensive research experience and strong mathematical backgrounds.
